First floor is the living room, well designed kitchen and large terrace. 
On the second floor you find the spacious and stylish bathroom, separate toilet, small laundry room and a bedroom. 
The topfloor is a loft like very large bedroom.

                                                         This apartment is located in a monumental canal house in an idyllic location on the Leliegracht, within walking distance of all the beauty that downtown Amsterdam has to offer. The apartment has 1 bedroom and is located on the ground floor of the rear house and offers access to a beautiful private garden.   
 Layout: Through the shared entrance you reach the rear house on the ground floor. Cozy living room with modern open kitchen, equipped with all necessary built-in appliances. Hallway that provides access to a separate toilet with sink and the bathroom, equipped with a bathtub and a separate shower. Separate room with washing machine and dryer. The bedroom is located on the garden side and has a large built-in closet. From the kitchen, the living room and the bedroom there is access to the very spacious and beautiful garden where you can also find a shed.   
 The rent price excludes the use of gas, water and electricity. For the use of these, a monthly advance payment of € 200,00 is charged.   
 The location of this apartment is ideal, right in the center of Amsterdam on one of the most beautiful canals and within walking distance of the famous 9 streets with various boutiques and specialty shops. There is a large selection of good restaurants and (hotel) bars in the immediate vicinity, such as the Pulitzer and the Hoxton hotel. The apartment is easily accessible by public transport, various trams stop around the corner. Amsterdam Central Station is easily accessible by tram or bicycle (within 5 minutes).   
 In short, a beautiful apartment in a very nice location!   
 This property can be rented by a tenant with their own sufficient monthly stable income from work and unfortunately not via a guarantor or a tenant who will not occupy the property himself.

description:
Description 

                                                         Prinsengracht, Amsterdam/ Grachtengordel (apprx. 135m2) € 3150,- excl. G/W/E 
 Renovated and spacious two-bedroom apartment on a unique location on the Prinsengracht in the heart of Amsterdam's historic centre! The apartment is located on the 3rd & 4th floor of a completely renovated canal house. The property will be delivered furnished and is available for an indefinite period.  
 Entrance takes place in the hallway, which provides access to the very spacious living room and open kitchen at the front of the apartment with generous views of the Amsterdam canals. The front windows are fitted with solar control glass and electric blinds. The living room has a sofa, large flat-screen TV and sitting and dining area. The modern open kitchen is equipped with all conveniences such as an oven/microwave combination, built-in fridge with freezer compartment, dishwasher, induction hob and plenty of storage space. The kitchen can also be used as a comfortable kitchen bar. A staircase from the living room leads to the second floor, which is very spacious. The second floor can be used for various purposes. 
 At the rear of the apartment is the bedroom, which is equipped with a wardrobe. The bathroom has a luxurious walk-in shower, washbasin and mirror. There is also a separate toilet. There is also a laundry room in the hallway. 
 Prinsengracht is part of Amsterdam's historic canals, which dates back to the 17th century. The canals breathe history and is known as a charming, quiet but also lively canal. Various catering establishments, supermarkets and various shops are located within a stone's throw. Moreover, the very popular neighbourhood De Jordaan, which is part of the bustling city centre, is also just around the corner. This unique location in the city provides excellent public transport connections throughout the rest of the city. Various bus, tram and metro stops are within walking distance and Amsterdam Central Station is easy to reach by bicycle. 
 In short, this property offers a unique opportunity to be part of Amsterdam city life!
house_name: For rent: Flat Prinsengracht in Amsterdam

description:
Description 

                                                         Beautiful bright apartment with character and comfort in the heart of Amsterdam East. With its spacious layout, luxurious amenities and lively environment, this apartment offers the best of Amsterdam East. An ideal home for those who love comfort, coziness and a vibrant neighborhood full of activities and facilities. 
 This beautiful apartment is in a prime location in the popular Oost neighborhood and offers everything you are looking for in a city home. With three spacious bedrooms, this apartment offers plenty of flexibility for both families and professionals. The layout, modern finishes and the cozy atmosphere of the neighborhood make this apartment highly recommended! 
 Layout 
Third floor 
Via the stairwell you reach the third floor, where a bright, open kitchen flows seamlessly into the spacious living room. The kitchen is equipped with modern appliances and offers enough space for delicious cooking and dining. From the living room you have access to one of the two balconies, where you can enjoy the sun. 
 Fourth floor 
One floor higher you will find two spacious bedrooms, both of which provide access to the second balcony. In addition to the bedrooms, there is an extra room that is ideal as a work or hobby room and can also serve as an extra bedroom. The luxurious bathroom on this floor features high-quality finishes and provides a relaxing place to start or end the day. 
 Environment 
This apartment is located in a vibrant neighborhood full of amenities and character: 
 The apartment is located in a lively area with everything within easy reach. Directly opposite is the Coffee Company, the meeting place for local residents of all ages. Here you can enjoy a cozy atmosphere with delicious coffee, delicacies and good conversations. A little further on you will find Het Badhuis, a popular spot on the corner that is open all day. Whether you fancy a cup of coffee and breakfast in the morning, a tasty lunch in the afternoon, dinner in the evening or a drink with a DJ later in the evening, Het Badhuis offers it all. 
 The pleasant Javastraat, known for its diversity of shops and restaurants, is on the doorstep. Whether you are looking for local delicacies or want to discover the flavors of world cuisines, you will find it all in this street. The neighborhood is also easily accessible; the bus and tram stop in front of the door, and you can be at Central Station within 15 minutes. Muiderpoort station is also within walking distance. 
 The Flevopark is just a five-minute walk away, a green oasis where you can enjoy a walk, picnic or exercise. The neighborhood also has an active community spirit, with a neighborhood committee that regularly organizes cultural activities. 
 With its spacious layout, luxurious amenities and lively environment, this apartment offers the best of Amsterdam East. An ideal home for those who love comfort, coziness and a vibrant neighborhood full of activities and facilities.

description:
Description 

                                                         Fantastic, completely renovated double-level ground floor apartment in Amsterdam Zuid, featuring many authentic details characteristic of the Amsterdam School style. The apartment includes no less than 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and a lovely spacious garden. Located within walking distance of the lively Beethovenstraat, the Vondelpark, and Station Zuid/WTC, with a fast connection to Schiphol Airport and the International School. 
 LOCATION 
The property is situated on a quiet street in a beautiful part of Amsterdam Zuid, close to the shops of Beethovenstraat, Stadionweg, public transport (including WTC Station), and the prestigious Zuidas. For daily groceries, you can visit Marqt, Albert Heijn, the well-known French bakery Le Fournil, or delicatessen shop L'Amuse. Various restaurants such as George Bistro, Neni, and Ferilli's are within walking distance. There is easy access to the A-10 ring road, and the Vondelpark and Beatrixpark are within reach. Several schools are within walking distance, and the neighborhood offers many playgrounds and a basketball court for children. 
 LAYOUT 
Ground Floor 
You enter this lovely home through a private front door. Upon entering, there is an entryway that leads to a spacious hallway, from where you have access to the large, bright, en-suite living room. At the front, there is a generous sitting area with street view, and at the rear, a delightful space that easily serves as a dining room with French doors opening to the garden. Also at the rear is the luxury, open-plan kitchen equipped with built-in appliances, including a cooktop, oven, refrigerator, and dishwasher. In the hallway, there is a separate toilet with a wash basin and stairs leading to the first floor. 
 There is also an indoor basement. 
 First Floor 
Stairs to the first floor, landing with access to all rooms. There are spacious bedrooms both at the front and rear. The generously sized rear bedroom has access to the balcony. There are also two smaller bedrooms, one at the front and one at the rear. Additionally, there is a separate toilet and a bathroom. The bathroom has a modern design and includes a bathtub, walk-in shower, vanity unit, and towel radiator and can be accessed from both the hallway and the master bedroom at the rear. There is also a separate bathroom accessible from the hallway, with a walk-in shower and spacious vanity unit. 
 SPECIAL FEATURES   
 
 Ground floor apartment with (rear) garden! 
 Garden will be beautifully landscaped 
 Completely renovated 
 Including curtains 
 Including washing machine & dryer 
 Luxury kitchen with built-in appliances 
 Fantastic location: quiet yet centrally located in the popular Amsterdam Oud Zuid 
 2 floors

 2 separate toilets 
 Indoor basement 
 Rent excludes gas, water, electricity, TV, and internet 
 2 months’ deposit 
 Available immediately

description:
Description 

                                                         Modern, Sustainable Family Home in Amsterdam-Noord – Fully Furnished & Move-In Ready 
 NOT AVAILABLE FOR STUDENTS 
 Looking for a comfortable, modern, and energy-efficient home in one of Amsterdam’s most vibrant neighborhoods? This beautiful, fully furnished property built in 2019 is your perfect urban retreat, ideally located in Amsterdam-Noord. With both a charming front garden and a spacious backyard (complete with a storage shed), this home offers a peaceful oasis just minutes away from the bustling city center. 
 Key Features 
 
 Bright and airy living spaces, thanks to floor-to-ceiling windows and high ceilings. 
 Fully equipped, contemporary kitchen with an induction cooktop, combi-oven, dishwasher, fridge, and extractor fan. 
 Luxuriously appointed bathroom with premium fixtures and exclusive tiles. 
 Sustainable design with HR++ glazing, underfloor heating, top-tier insulation, and solar panels, keeping your energy costs low. 
 Free on-street parking directly in front of the house. 
 
 Location 
Nestled just a 3-minute walk from the IJ River, you'll enjoy stunning views of the evolving Houthavens skyline. From there, explore the Haarlemmerdijk, Jordaan, Negen Straatjes, Westerpark, or Spaarndammerbuurt. The NDSM wharf, trendy spots like Pllek and Café Noorderlicht, are all within easy reach. Take the ferry to Amsterdam Central Station, and you'll be connected to the entire city and beyond. For drivers, the A10 ring road is just 5 minutes away. 
 Details 
 
 Furnished mid-terrace house of approx. 90m² 
 Three spacious bedrooms 
 Hardwood floors throughout (ground floor and upper level) 
 Elegant window treatments 
 Private backyard with a storage shed and secured rear access 
 Cozy front garden 
 Nearly energy-neutral home, with minimal energy costs 
 Available immediately 
 Excludes utilities (electricity, water, TV, and internet) 
 Security deposit: 2 months’ rent 
 
 This property offers the perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and sustainability. If you're looking for a place to call home that’s close to the city yet feels like a peaceful retreat, this is it. 
 Please Note: 
We have taken great care to compile this information. However, no liability is accepted for any inaccuracies, incompleteness, or otherwise. All listed sizes and measurements are indicative.

 Are you looking for an inspiring place to live and study or work in The Hague? We offer a beautiful home and a flex space, ideal for students or creatives looking for a comfortable and efficient solution. Both the house and the flex place are centrally located and easily accessible by public transport or highway.

 The flex space

 Costs and support 
As a tenant, you choose one package in which you purchase two services, each with its own contract. You pay a fixed price for this package. description:
Description 

                                                         Johannes Verhulststraat, Amsterdam (approx. 140m2) € 4.750,- Excl. electricity, heating and water 
 Ultra-luxury and high-quality finished double upstairs apartment of over 140 m2 on the second and third floor in the heart of Oud-Zuid! Located on the corner with Emmastraat, in the characteristic Albert Heijn building, this very spacious, amazing apartment boasts a tasteful finish and lots of natural light. The apartment has a herringbone floor with infrared underfloor heating and a sunny private roof terrace. Completely renovated, making you the first resident since the renovation. 
 Entrance hall with access to the spacious living room with many windows and modern open kitchen. The living and dining areas are practically separated from each other by the authentically restored en-suite doors. The chic open kitchen is equipped with various high-end built-in appliances, such as a fridge-freezer combination, Miele combi oven, induction hob with extractor system, Quooker and a dishwasher. The kitchen offers plenty of cupboard space because the kitchen cupboards reach the ceiling. In the hall there is also a separate guest toilet and the open staircase provides access to the third floor. On the landing there are fitted wardrobes and no fewer than three bedrooms. There are also two bathrooms on this floor. The bathroom with bath, walk-in shower and washbasin can be reached from the master bedroom. The second bathroom has a walk-in shower and toilet and is accessible from the landing. The open staircase from the landing provides access to the roof terrace of no less than 24 m2. 
 This apartment is located in a truly prime location, exactly between the two elegant districts of Willemspark and the Museum Quarter. Recognizable by its beautiful avenues, charming bakeries and chic restaurants. With direct access to some of Amsterdam's most popular attractions, such as the Vondelpark, the beautiful Rijksmuseum and the Concertgebouw, all of which can be reached on foot in 15 minutes or less. Sufficient public transport connections, including bus and tram lines, are at your disposal.
house_name: For rent: Flat Johannes Verhulststraat in Amsterdam

description:
Description 

                                                         Beautifully situated on the Keizersgracht, this 145m² apartment features three bedrooms, a sun-drenched terrace, and stunning views over the canal. 
 Arrive at this historic property through a beautifully finished shared entrance and ascend to your private entry. Inside, you’re welcomed by a spacious, light-filled interior enhanced by original wooden beams, one of which is left in its natural finish. This adds a playful touch while visually dividing the living and dining areas. 
 The modern U-shaped kitchen is a culinary haven, equipped with high-end appliances, including a large oven, induction cooktop, quooker, and integrated wine cooler. Through the large windows on both sides, plenty sunlight floods through the space, bringing warmth and natural light to the kitchen and cozy dining nook. 
 The living room offers a blend of comfort and style, featuring a fireplace and a projector with a screen for cinematic movie nights. Large windows frame a breathtaking view over the Keizersgracht canal, showcasing the charm of historic Amsterdam. Every room benefits from underfloor heating, powered by innovative solar panels, ensuring comfort in an energy-efficient way. 
 On the first floor, at the back of the apartment, you’ll find a spacious bedroom with built-in wardrobes, offering ample storage. The large windows provide a picture-perfect view of beautifully landscaped gardens, creating a serene, almost painting-like atmosphere that enhances the room’s peaceful ambiance. The en-suite bathroom is a luxurious retreat, complete with a freestanding bathtub with elegant gold metal fixtures, a matching rain shower, a double vanity, and a large LED-lit round mirror for added style. 
 Moving up to the second floor, you’re greeted by a versatile room that can serve as both an office and guest room. The original beams add character, and the cleverly designed flip-up desk maximizes the space, offering a tidy solution when not in use. This floor also features two comfortable bedrooms and a stylish bathroom with a rain shower, toilet, and a sleek vanity. 
 A small staircase leads you up to the sun-filled rooftop terrace, where you can relax with a snack or drink while enjoying the views. A convenient kitchenette on the second floor, equipped with a small fridge, makes it easy to grab refreshments and unwind on the terrace. 
 Details: 
 
 Rental price: € 4.950,- per month excluding service costs, utilities, internet/TV, and local taxes 
 Available from: November 29th, 2024 
 Contract C, fixed term of one year 
 2 month’s deposit  
 Furnished 
 3 bedrooms 
 2 bathrooms 
 Completely renovated 
 Amazing roof terrace 
 
 Nestled between the Leidsegracht and the vibrant “9 Straatjes” (Nine Streets), this apartment is surrounded by boutique shops and trendy restaurants. The Jordaan, Noordermarkt, and Lindengracht markets are nearby, perfect for weekend exploration. With excellent public transport connections, including tram and bus stops a 5-minute walk away, the apartment offers easy access to all parts of Amsterdam, including the South Axis. Central Station is a 15-minute stroll, and exploring by bike or boat adds to the charm.
house_name: For rent: Flat Keizersgracht in Amsterdam

description:
Description 

                                                         The apartment is situated in a unique location in the Felix Meritisbuurt in the Grachtengordel-West. From the living room you can enjoy a spectacular view of the Westermarkt, Westerkerk, Westertoren, the Prinsengracht and the Keizersgracht. 
 The apartment is situated on the third floor of a small-scale complex and has a living area of 67 m². At the rear, the house has a lovely, spacious balcony facing south. 
 The house is within walking distance of the Dam and a variety of other nice shops, restaurants, bars and other entertainment venues. Furthermore, the popular Negen Straatjes and the Jordaan can also be reached on foot. And not unimportant, public transport stops practically in front of the door. Like the entire city centre within the Singelgracht, this house has also been designated as a Nationally Protected Cityscape. 
 LOCATION 
 This 3-room apartment is situated in a prime location in the heart of the city centre, with a view of the Westerkerk. From the Westermarkt you can easily walk to the Dam and there are numerous cafes, supermarkets, gyms, restaurants, shops and markets in the area. For example, on Mondays there is the Noordermarkt with antiques, second-hand goods, clothing, flowers and fresh produce and on Saturdays the usual fresh market on the Lindengracht with organic products on the Noordermarkt. The famous Nine Streets with special shops and boutiques are also around the corner. For your daily shopping you can go to the Albert Heijn diagonally below the house. 
 ACCESSIBILITY 
 The apartment is very easily accessible by car from the A-10 ring road (S106, S108). Tram lines 13 and 17 and bus lines N47, N57, N82, N83, N84 and N97 are within walking distance. The Amsterdam Central Station is within cycling distance. Parking in the area is possible through a permit system, on the public road there is also the possibility of paid parking. There are several parking garages in the area where parking spaces are offered for rent. 
 LAYOUT GROUND FLOOR: Closed entrance with doorbells, mailboxes and staircase. 
 THIRD FLOOR (fully equipped with a beautiful laminate wooden floor): All rooms are accessible via the central hall, at the front of the house is the spacious living room. The living room has pleasant natural light through the 3 large windows and a fantastic view of the Westertoren. The open kitchen is placed in a corner arrangement and equipped with built-in appliances. At the rear of the house are the two well-sized bedrooms. The large bedroom has a fixed wardrobe wall and a door to the south-facing balcony of 4 m². The bathroom is neutrally tiled and equipped with a bath and a sink. There is also a separate toilet, a large storage room and a laundry room with the central heating combi boiler.

description:
Description 

                                                         INTERESTED 
It is not possible to schedule a viewing by phone. To view this property, please submit your request via email, our website’s application form, or through digital platforms such as ****** and Pararius. We will do our best to respond as quickly as possible! 
 WELCOME TO THE HAGUE 
Located in the charming and popular Bezuidenhout neighborhood, this beautiful and stylishly furnished apartment of approximately 80 m² features a delightful 65 m² garden facing southwest. The apartment includes a cozy living room (with an option to create a second bedroom), one bedroom, an open kitchen, and a modern bathroom. The entire property has underfloor heating and triple glazing. The rental term is for a maximum of one year, making this an ideal place to live and enjoy! 
 AREA – Bezuidenhout 
Situated in the highly desirable and trendy Bezuidenhout neighborhood, right in the center of The Hague, this area has everything you could wish for. Here you’ll find the lively Theresiastraat with its variety of shops, cafes, and restaurants. At the heart of the neighborhood lies the famous and historic Haagse Bos, where Huis ten Bosch Palace is located. This is the perfect spot for a run, a picnic by the water, or a stroll among beautiful, old trees – a green oasis within the city! Public transportation is excellent in The Hague, with trams and buses always nearby to take you quickly to Central Station, from which the entire city is accessible. The property is conveniently located near major highways (A12 toward Utrecht and N44 + A4 toward Amsterdam). 
 LAYOUT 
Ground Floor 
The entrance hall provides access to all rooms. The cozy and inviting living room has French doors that open onto the sunny garden. The lovely open kitchen is equipped with all necessary appliances, including an induction cooktop with extractor, oven, dishwasher, and refrigerator/freezer. The spacious bedroom at the front of the apartment can also serve as a workspace. The comfortable bathroom features a walk-in shower, vanity unit, and toilet. A closet in the living room houses the washing machine. 
 INSULATION AND HEATING 
The property has an energy rating of A+++. It is fully equipped with triple glazing and underfloor heating. Heating and hot water are supplied via a ventilation heat pump boiler. The apartment was built in 1928. 
 FIXED UTILITY PAYMENT 
The tenant will pay a monthly advance of €150,00 for water, electricity, internet, and cleaning (once per month). This payment is fixed. 
 PARKING 
The apartment is located in a permit parking area. A parking permit can be requested from The Hague Municipality for approximately €95,00 per year, subject to availability and regulations. 
 HIGHLIGHTS 
 
 Living area approx. 80 m² 
 Energy label A+++ 
 Southwest-facing garden of 65 m² 
 Fully equipped with triple glazing 
 Fully furnished 
 Luxury kitchen with built-in appliances 
 1 bedroom 
 1 bathroom 
 1 toilet 
 Entire apartment with laminate flooring 
 Washing machine included 
 Garden of 65 m², southwest-facing 
 Excellent location 
 Not suitable for students/shared occupancy 
 Fixed-term lease of 1 year, minimum of 12 months, with diplomatic clause for the landlord 
 No pets allowed 
 Smoking is not allowed 
 Rent is €1.900,00 excluding per month 
 Fixed utilities fee: €150,00 (electricity, water, and internet) 
 Mandatory monthly cleaning €50.00 per month 
 Landlord provides regular garden maintenance 
 Deposit is 1 month 
 Available as of 01-01-2025 
 
 Disclaimer 
The information provided in this presentation has been compiled with care, but we cannot guarantee the completeness, accuracy, or timeliness of the information as details may change. We recommend verifying the latest information directly with the relevant agencies. We appreciate your understanding and are available to answer any questions you may have.

                                                         This beautiful apartment with energy label A is located on the 31st floor of the New Babylon complex in The Hague. This lovely apartment offers an abundance of natural light through large windows, providing breathtaking views over the city. The apartment features a spacious balcony, perfect for enjoying the skyline. 
 The New Babylon complex offers convenience, with a service manager available from Monday to Friday, 7 AM to 9 PM. Residents also have access to on-site amenities, including a fitness center, hotel, and a variety of restaurants and shops. The Hague Central Station, with its trains, trams, and buses, is just a few steps away, and major highways (A12 and A4) are easily accessible. A supermarket is located in the same building. 
 Located just across from The Hague Forest, and with department stores, cafes, bars, and the city's vibrant culinary scene at your doorstep, this apartment combines luxury and practicality in an unbeatable location. Have a drink on a terrace in the city center of The Hague at the famous "Plein" or "Grote Markt" or treat yourself to a lovely lunch or dinner in one of the restaurants situated here. 
 Layout: 
On the ground floor, you can take the elevator to the 31st floor where the apartment is situated. You step into a hallway providing access to every room in the apartment. The luminous living space boasts windows stretching from floor to ceiling, along with sliding doors that open onto a spacious balcony with a breathtaking panoramic view over the city. The open kitchen with kitchen island is fully fitted with appliances such as an induction hob, extractor hood, oven, fridge-freezer, and dishwasher. 
 The large master bedroom is located at the rear. Two more bedrooms are present, one of which is used as a walk-in closet. The bathroom is fully equipped with a walk-in shower, toilet, and double washbasin. A guest toilet is located in the hall along with a large utility room equipped with a washer and dryer.

description:
Description 

                                                         Ms. Van Riemsdijkweg, Amsterdam/Pontkade (apprx. 88m2) € 2955,- excl. G/W/E and including private parking 
 Always wanted to live in the city and by the water? Look no further; because living on Pontkade makes both possible. This completely newly completed and beautifully designed 3-room flat offers all the benefits of living in Amsterdam as well as peace, space and spectacular views from the fifth floor with private parking! 
 The apartment is superbly finished: light grey tiled floor with underfloor heating, black window frames, electric blinds, curtains, a luxury kitchen with Siemens appliances and a comfortable ultramodern bathroom. Through the hall you reach the living room and open kitchen, which is very spacious and bright thanks to the high windows. Enjoy breathtaking views from the spacious terrace (28m2) over the Amsterdam IJ. The open kitchen is equipped with all the necessities such as an oven/microwave, induction hob, dishwasher, fridge, freezer and a Quooker. The first bedroom is particularly spacious and gives access to the terrace. The second bedroom is also spacious and is ideal to use as a children's or study. The bathroom is extremely luxurious and equipped with a very spacious walk-in shower and beautiful washbasin. There is also a separate toilet.  
 The apartment has modern features such as an intercom and heat-back-win system, mechanical ventilation and double curtain rails, giving it a luxurious feel. Moreover, the flat has a private parking space under the building and a storage room. Finally, you can enjoy the attractive courtyard garden which provides plenty of outdoor space to enjoy the sun. 
 Living on Pontkade, that's ‘Urban Chic Living’. These apartments are located on the populair NDSM werf right on the IJ in Amsterdam and features tiled floors, modern sleek walls and unique views of on the IJ. A relief to live both spacious, light and quiet with wide views and at the same time be so close to the city centre. Living on Pontkade also means lively and colourful living within walking distance of hotspots such as Pllek, the IJhallen and the Veronicaschip. This ‘upcoming’ residential area has all the necessities for comfortable living, such as supermarkets (Albert Heijn), event venues, hotels and many catering establishments like Loetje, Bagels and Beans, Cannibale Royale and many more. Several sports facilities are located around the corner, including a padel club. The Pontkade can be seen directly on the harbour where several ferries make the direct connection to Amsterdam CS and the Houthavens every 10 minutes. Pontkade is part of 4 buildings around a central courtyard garden, a green oasis that completes the living experience and is mainly situated in 2 towers with phenomenal views over the city. 
 In short, a unique property in a beautiful location in Amsterdam!
house_name: For rent: Flat ms. van Riemsdijkweg in Amsterdam

This stylishly furnished apartment is located in the Hortus area and thus in a very green environment. The house is tastefully decorated and equipped with all comforts, you can also enjoy your own private garden with roof.

The living area contains a sitting area and dining table, while the kitchen is a compact kitchenette. The sleeping area is usually separated with a room divider or open closet. The bathroom, includes a shower, toilet and sink. Clever storage solutions, such as built-in closets or shelves, help make efficient use of the space.

description:
Description 

                                                         This is a ground floor upholstered family-apartment, with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, washroom, large garden, walk in closet, and spacious lounge, kitchen and dining area.  
 The apartment exudes a luxury feel in its finishing as it is newly renovated and has energy efficient floor heating throughout and has a label B rating.  
 This apartment is delivered in upholstered (curtains and light fittings and white goods) state, furniture shown in the pictures is not included. 
 One enters the apartment on the ground floor into a long hallway. From this hallway one can access the Master bedroom, second bedroom, second bathroom, separate guest toilet, washroom and the living with lounge/dining/kitchen area on the garden side of the apartment. 
 The kitchen is fully equipped and offers plenty of storage, it has a nice island underneath a skylight. It is in a shared space that also offers enough room to create dining area and a cosy and comfortable lounge. It overlooks the 68m2 garden, which is north facing, but deep enough to have plenty of sun during the summer and has a wooden shed (of approx. 6 m2) for additional storage. Ensuite to the living is a third bedroom that also overlooks the garden.  
 The other two bedrooms are located on the street side, which has little through traffic and is separated from the major thoroughfare by a little park which is about 80 meters wide. Solid double glazing provide both insulation from cold/heat as well as noise. 
 The master bedroom is a spacious and comfortable bedroom which has a walk in closet connecting it to the ensuite bathroom. The bathroom is fully equipped with walk in shower, bathtub, toilet, towel heater, double vanity sink and non-fog mirrors. 
 From the central hallway one can also access a second bathroom with single vanity sink, walk in shower and towel heater. Adjacent to this bathroom there is a washroom with washer and dryer as well as a separate guest toilet. 
 The apartment is located next to Rembrandtpark, for local shopping there are supermarkets within 5 minutes walk and Hoofddorpplein and Kinkerstraat are within 5 minutes cycling. Leidseplein, Jordaan and de Pijp are within a 15 minute bike ride.  
 Lelylaan train station is around the corner and tram 1 is practically in front of the house. So its equally easy to use public transport to explore both city and country. 
 If you rather use a car, the estimate wait time for a permit is 3 month (November 2024) and with the A10 nearby its easy to travel out of the city. 
 Please tell us a little more about yourself if you are interested in a viewing; 
 
 desired start date 
 length of lease 
 when are you available for viewings 
 nature of employment (employer, position, gross earnings) 
 outlook for Amsterdam, how long do you plan to stay 
 occupants of apartment // nature of household (who will live there - answer above for all occupants) 
 
 Income requirement applies, for this apartment gross (local) income of inhabitant needs to be more than three times the rent.

                                                         MAXX: NICE ROOM FOR RENT ON THE SCHUITENDIEP IN GRONINGEN 
 INFORMATION 
 In addition to the photos, we have also made a detailed video of the living space.  
 INTEREST? 
 You can leave a reaction via the website by clicking ‘Yes I am interested’. By phone, we cannot process your response. 
 LOCATION 
 The living space is located on the Schuitendiep on the canal. With less than a minute's walk you are in the heart of the city centre, where all the amenities you desire are available. Central Station is about five minutes by bike. The Zernike Campus is about 10 minutes by bike. 
 SITUATION 
 The room is located on the first floor at the back. 
 SURFACE 
 The room has an area of approximately 11,5 m2. 
 INDELING 
 The room is located on the first floor at the back. The room has enough space for a desk and a double bed. Clothes or the like can be stored in the built-in cupboards. The room has a sliding door that takes you to the (shared) balcony. Facilities such as the kitchen, bathroom and toilet are shared with the other tenants. 
 RENT & SECURITY DEPOSIT 
 The basic rental price of the flat is €433,81. The service costs are €30,- per month. The costs for the gas, water and electricity are €70,- per month. this makes a total of €533,-, the municipal taxes of €20 are added, internet and TV are arranged by yourself. The deposit is equal to two times the basic monthly rent. 
 RENTAL RATE 
 Rental allowance application for this property is not possible. 
 AVAILABILITY & RENTAL PERIOD 
 The room is available from 1 December. 
 Please note: there is a campus contract applicable for this living space which means that you have to leave the living space at the end of your studies so that the property remains available for a student tenant. 
 CANDIDATE 
 We are looking for neat candidates for the property. A guarantor is requested. 
 INTEREST? 
 You can leave a comment via the website by clicking on ‘Yes I am interested’. The timeline will determine which candidates we can invite for the first selection. By phone, we cannot consider your response. 
 YOUTUBE 
 To keep up to date with available living spaces, subscribe to our YouTube channel ****** free of charge. Turn on your notification to receive a notification when a new video is uploaded.

description:
Description 

                                                         Rokin 18 C, 1012 KR Amsterdam 
 LIGHT AND BRIGHT FULLY FURNISHED ONE BEDROOM APARTMENT OF APPROX. 55M2 IN THE CENTRE OF AMSTERDAM   
 The apartment is characterised by its stylish appearance, where you immediately notice the beautiful light. The wooden beams in the living room give it a characteristic look and feel. 
The apartment is located on the second floor of a monumental building. It is within walking distance of the Dam Square, the Rembrandtplein and the Kalverstraat. 
 LOCATION AND SURROUNDINGS: 
Located in the heart of Amsterdam, this apartment offers the ultimate urban experience. 
With the Dam Square, the Kalverstraat and the Spui within walking distance, you have access to exclusive shops, cozy cafés and cultural hotspots such as the Royal Palace and the Beguinage. 
The area is buzzing with restaurants and bars, while the proximity to the North/South line and tram lines ensure fast connections throughout the city. 
You can reach Central Station within a few minutes, and for daily shopping there are numerous supermarkets and specialty stores nearby. 
The apartment is well connected to public transportation (streetcar 4, 14, 24 and the ''Noord/Zuidlijn''). 
 In short, a top location for those who want to live in the middle of Amsterdam and enjoy everything the city has to offer. 
 LAY-OUT OF THE APARTMENT: 
Communal entrance with staircase leading up to the second floor. 
Spacious living room with big windows creating a light and bright living space. 
Fully equipped open kitchen feauturing a fidge and freezer, five pit gas stove, oven and dishwasher. 
Spacious main bedroom with plenty of wardrobe space and the bathroom en-suite featuring a walk-in shower and washbasin. 
Seperate room for storage and the washing machine and dryer. 
Hallway with seperate toilet. 
 PARTICULARS: 
 
 Fully furnished apartment of approx. 55 m2; 
 Located in the city centre; 
 Recently renovated and tastefully decorated; 
 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom; 
 Monumental building; 
 Model A contract; 
 Service costs € 15,-- per month. 
 
 Directly available. 
Rent price € 2.150,-- excluding utilities G/W/E & TV + internet and local tax. 
 The apartment is for rent for expats with the owner's prior consent.

description:
Description 

                                                         NEAR THE BEACH | 2 BEDROOMS | ENERGY LABEL B | 79m² | 
 Enjoy the peace, easiness and calmness of the coast here. 
The apartment is located in the middle of the dunes and a stone's throw from the beach. From the balcony on the first floor you have an unobstructed view of the dunes, beach and the sea. The apartment has a bright, spacious living room, two bedrooms, a neatly maintained bathroom, kitchen, dining area, separate toilet and sufficient storage space. With this apartment you also get 2 parking places in the underground garage. 
From the apartment you can walk a short distance to the Hoek van Holland beach metro station, which then takes you to Rotterdam city centre (Beurs metro station) in about 40 minutes. 
 Layout: 
Ground floor: doorbells, entrance, elevator and staircase, extra staircase to parking garage 
Apartment, 1st floor: upon entering the apartment you arrive in the hall, here you will find the toilet and storage space on the right. Via the hallway you reach the living room. The living space is designed in such a way that there is a good connection between the living, cooking and dining area. 
When entering the space, the kitchen is located on the right. On the left you will find the living area. Through the living room you have access to the balcony and adjacent bedrooms. The bathroom is accessible from both bedrooms and has a separate bath and shower. There is also a second toilet and neat sink. 
 Conditions and details: 
 
 Minimum rental period: 12 months (ROZ) 
 Available from December 2, 2024 
 Rental price excluding utilities / internet / TV / municipal taxes 
 No pets, no smoking 
 Deposit: in consultation, minimum 1 month 
 Furnished apartment

 Rental price including 2 parking spaces

description:
Description 

                                                         Marcusstraat (107 m2) Zuideramstel 3.800,00 Excl. G/W/E, Tv and Internet 
  Not available for students  
 Appartement: 
 Beautiful apartment located in the Zuideramstel/Weesperbuurt. The apartment was completed in 2014 and therefore has an excellent A+++ energy label and is equipped with every luxury. 
 The house is divided over two floors. The entrance to the house is on the 6th floor, and the apartment is divided over 2 floors. The entrance to the house is on the top floor and gives access to the 2 smaller rooms and a separate bathroom. 
 The (bed)rooms both have large patio doors, which fills the rooms with plenty of daylight. These rooms can be furnished according to your own choice. 
 The bathroom on this floor is equipped with all conveniences, including a separate shower, toilet, and sink. 
 The open kitchen and living room are entered via the illuminated staircase down. 
 The spacious living room is equipped with luxurious furniture that fits beautifully with the apartment. The large windows ensure that plenty of daylight enters the living room. The patio doors give access to the spacious, covered balcony with a view of a large and beautiful enclosed courtyard as well as a piece of the Amsterdam skyline. 
 The living room has an open kitchen. This spacious kitchen is equipped with all conveniences, including plenty of storage space, built-in refrigerator and freezer, large induction hob, extractor hood, oven, and a dishwasher. 
 On the other side of the house is the large master bedroom. This fully furnished space has beautiful furniture and lighting, including a built-in wardrobe. In this bedroom is the second bathroom with double sink and shower. 
 Through the hall is a separate toilet room as well as a laundry room with washing machine and dryer. 
 Location: 
 The Marcusstraat, where only local traffic comes, is a quiet side street of the well-known Wibautstraat. Here is the entrance to the house and also the parking garage. There is ample parking in the area and by car you are on the A10 ring road within 10 minutes. Within cycling and walking distance, the area offers city parks, shops, cafes, entertainment venues and various local shops. Amstel station is 700m away and the nearest metro entrance is 150m from the building. 
 In short, a complete luxury home in a beautiful location! 
 Extra: 
 
 
 Underground parking space included in the price 
 
 
 3,800,- Excl. G/W/E, TV and internet 
 
 
 Not available for students 
 
 
 Energy label A+++ 
 
 
 Zuideramstel

description:
Description 

                                                         A super nice and very bright four-room ground floor apartment of 92 M2 just a few minutes from the Amsterdam city border and a short distance from the Amsterdamse Bos, in the nicest village of Amsterdam: Badhoevedorp! 
Environment and accessibility: 
 You are a short distance from Amsterdam and still has a nice village atmosphere. This makes Badhoevedorp an extremely popular place to live. Located near the growing (to be renewed) shopping center with local shops, specialty shops, restaurants, various supermarkets and the market on Wednesday. There are plenty of sports facilities: think of the swimming pool, several gyms, a football club, korfball and athletics club and hockey fields. There is a wide, varied choice of very good primary schools in the village. Together with the spacious and green layout, it makes a child-friendly environment. 
 You can park for free in front of the door and by car you can reach all major roads within a few minutes, such as the A4, A5, A9 and A10. Bus lines 145 and 192 take you with a direct connection to Schiphol and the center of Amsterdam. It is therefore a perfect location for the discerning business traveller; Schiphol can be reached in no time, as can cities such as Haarlem, Hoofddorp and The Hague. With a few minutes cycling you are already in Amsterdam via the bridge over the Ringvaart! 
The general layout of the house is as follows: 
 Ground floor: 
 Entrance/hall with meter cupboard and separate toilet. At the front of the house is the L-shaped open kitchen with built-in appliances (including a 5-burner gas hob, extractor hood, dishwasher, fridge, freezer and an oven). The spacious, bright living room with a stair cupboard gives access to the backyard of approx. 55 m2 with a separate wooden shed where you can easily store the bicycles and other belongings. The backyard with back entrance, located on the sunny south, is well maintained. Here you can enjoy the sun all day long! 
 First floor: 
 Via the staircase at the entrance you reach the first floor with a landing and fixed built-in cupboard. Here are 3 spacious bedrooms and the bathroom. The luxurious bathroom has a 2nd toilet, sink and shower with underfloor heating. 
 Second floor: 
 Stairs to the attic with dormer windows on both sides. Two spacious bedrooms and the central heating boiler and washing machine / dryer connection are also located here. 
 Particularities: 
 
 Living area: 92 M2 
 rear garden 
 Own (bicycle) storage room on the ground floor of 7 M2. 
 Three very pleasant bedrooms. 
 The entire apartment has a neat laminate tile floor. 
 Modern kitchen with various built-in appliances. 
 Free parking and many amenities nearby. 
 Elevator present 
 Delivered upholstered (without furniture) 
 
 Suitable for sharers, families or a couple.
house_name: For rent: Flat Meidoornweg in Badhoevedorp

Description 

                                                         Mooie chalet op recreatiepark te huur in Schaijk 
 Deze leuke chalet is gelegen op recreatiepark 'De Landerije' in Schaijk. Het chalet is gelegen op een rustige locatie op het park. Ook zijn er in de diverse nabijheid diverse voorzieningen als supermarkten en scholen. De snelwegen richting de grote steden als Den Bosch, Oss en Nijmegen zijn snel en gemakkelijk te bereiken. 
 Indeling en omschrijving huur chalet Schaijk: 
 Entree:U komt binnen in de hal van het chalet, welke u toegang geeft tot de ruime woonkamer met open keuken, een slaapkamer, apart toilet en de badkamer. 
 Woonkamer:De woonkamer beschikt over een nette laminaatvloer en geniet van veel lichtinval middels de grote raampartij. De woonkamer biedt u toegang middels een deur tot de tuin. 
 Keuken:De ruime keuken in hoekopstelling is voorzien is van allerlei inbouwapparatuur, zoals een gaskookplaat, afzuigkap, koelkast en vaatwasser. 
 Slaapkamers:Het chalet beschikt over twee ruime slaapkamers. De eerste slaapkamer is te bereiken via de hal. De andere slaapkamer is te bereiken middels een deur in de keuken. De slaapkamers zijn beiden voorzien van een nette laminaatvloer. 
 Badkamer:De nette geheel betegelde badkamer is voorzien van een douche, wastafel en toilet. Tevens bevindt zich hier de aansluiting voor de wasmachine. 
 De huurprijs van deze chalet in Schaijk bedraagt € 1.225,00 exclusief de kosten voor de energie. Voor de waarborgsom dient u rekening te houden met een bedrag een bedrag van € 2.000,00. De woning is per direct beschikbaar.

description:
Description 

                                                         *English below* 
 In de historische binnenstad van Haarlem gelegen ZÓ TE BETREKKEN gemeubileerde 3-kamerappartement met hoge plafonds! Het fraaie complex is compleet GERENOVEERD in 2014. Het appartement is gelegen op de 2e verdieping en is heerlijk RUIM en LICHT. De woonkamer is door de hoge plafonds en de open woonkeuken met kookeiland een MOOIE OPEN ruimte. De 2 goede slaapkamers grenzen aan het zonnige BALKON; een heerlijke plek om in de zomer te genieten van een kopje koffie! 
 Verder beschikt het appartement over een moderne badkamer, een apart toilet en een aparte wasruimte. 
De ligging van het appartement is perfect voor binnenstadliefhebbers; midden in het historische stadshart, in één van de leukste (grotendeels autoluwe) winkelstraatjes van Nederland. De Kleine Houtstraat is meerdere achtereenvolgende jaren uitgeroepen tot 'leukste winkelstraat van Nederland'. De Grote Markt, het Spaarne en alle winkel-, horeca- en culturele voorzieningen die de Haarlemse binnenstad rijk is bevinden zich op loopafstand van de woning. Evenals Parkeergarage De Kamp en het NS-station bevinden zich op korte loopafstand. Uitvalswegen richting Amsterdam, Schiphol en Den Haag zijn eenvoudig bereikbaar. Ook de duinen en het strand zijn op 30 minuten fietsafstand. 
 * HARTJE CENTRUM * ROYAAL * LICHT * GERENOVEERD * SFEERVOL * ZONNIG BALKON * HOGE PLAFONDS * 2 SLAAPKAMERS * WOONKEUKEN MET KOOKEILAND * MODERNE BADKAMER * INSTAPKLAAR * KLEINE HOUTSTRAAT *

Entree, gezamenlijke entree, intercom met camera, brievenbus, gang met stallingsruimte voor fietsen, galerij met Scandinavisch uiterlijk en wenteltrap naar de bovengelegen verdiepingen. 
 2e verdieping 
Entree, ruime hal, royale woonkamer met fraaie raampartij en hoog plafond, moderne open keuken v.v. kookeiland en diverse inbouwapparatuur waaronder 5-pits gaskookplaat, afzuigkap, combi-oven, koel-/vriescombinatie en vaatwasser, ruime ouderslaapkamer met schuifpui naar het zonnige balkon gelegen op het zuidoosten, 2e slaapkamer of mogelijk kantoor in huis met eveneens toegang tot het balkon, moderne badkamer met inloopdouche, dubbele wastafel en designradiator, zwevend toilet met fonteintje, praktische inpandige berging met wasmachine-/drogeraansluiting, c.v.-opstelling en mechanische ventilatie unit. 
 Bijzonderheden 
- prachtige voorgevel

- hoge plafonds; ruim 3 meter! 
- royale woonkamer 
- 73 m2

 Situated in the historic city center of Haarlem, this READY-TO-MOVE-IN 3-room apartment of 78 m2 boasts high ceilings! The beautiful complex was fully RENOVATED in 2014. Located on the 2nd floor, the apartment is spacious and filled with natural light. The living room, with its high ceilings and open kitchen featuring a cooking island, creates a BEAUTIFUL OPEN SPACE. The two well-sized bedrooms both open onto the sunny BALCONY, a perfect spot to enjoy a cup of coffee in the summer! 
 The apartment also offers a modern bathroom, a separate toilet, and a separate laundry room. The location is ideal for city lovers, right in the heart of the historic center, on one of the most charming (largely car-free) shopping streets in the Netherlands. Kleine Houtstraat has been repeatedly voted 'the most charming shopping street in the Netherlands.' The Grote Markt, the Spaarne River, and all the shopping, dining, and cultural amenities Haarlem’s city center has to offer are just a short walk away. Parking garage De Kamp and Haarlem train station are also within walking distance. The main highways to Amsterdam, Schiphol, and The Hague are easily accessible. The dunes and beach are just a 30-minute bike ride away. 
 HEART OF THE CITY * SPACIOUS * BRIGHT * RENOVATED * CHARMING * SUNNY BALCONY * HIGH CEILINGS * 2 BEDROOMS * OPEN KITCHEN WITH COOKING ISLAND * MODERN BATHROOM * MOVE-IN READY * KLEINE HOUTSTRAAT *

kitchen with cooking island and built-in appliances including a 5-burner gas stove, extractor hood, 
combi-oven, fridge/freezer combo, and dishwasher, large master bedroom with sliding doors to 
the sunny southeast-facing balcony, second bedroom (or possible home office) also with access 
to the balcony, modern bathroom with walk-in shower, double sink, and designer radiator, 
floating toilet with hand basin, practical indoor storage room with washer/dryer connections, 
central heating system, and mechanical ventilation unit. 
 Details 
• The apartment dates back to 1850 
• Furnished

• Located on one of the most charming shopping streets in Haarlem 
• Spacious apartment

• Large living room 
• 73 m2

• 2 bedrooms 
• Attractive PVC flooring throughout the apartment 
• Very central location 
• Completely renovated in 2014 
• Fully double-glazed, except for two small fixed windows 
• Available from 8-11-2024 
• EUR 2245,- per month excl.

description:
Description 

                                                         SPACIOUS APARTMENT AVAILABLE IN NEWLY BUILT RENTAL PROPERTY ON BURGEMEESTER AUGUSTIJNSTRAAT IN ZOETERMEER 
 This newly built apartment on Burgemeester Augustijnstraat in Zoetermeer is now available for rent. Completed in 2023 with an A+++ energy label, this home is equipped with all modern conveniences and offers great comfort. Situated close to Bentwoud, various public amenities, public transport connections, and major highways to The Hague, Rotterdam, and Utrecht, this is an ideal apartment in the Randstad area. 
 You enter the building through the shared entrance with an intercom panel and access to the elevator. 
 Upon entering the apartment, you step into the central hallway, which connects all rooms within the apartment. The hallway provides enough space to create a wardrobe area. 
 The living room with open kitchen is remarkably bright due to windows (and doors to the balcony) on two sides of the apartment. The balcony faces southwest. The living room is a wonderfully bright space that offers plenty of room for both a spacious sitting area and a dining area. 
 The modern kitchen is fully equipped and offers ample workspace. The facilities include an induction hob, stainless steel extractor hood, dishwasher, fridge/freezer combination, combi-oven/microwave, and plenty of cupboard space. 
 The bathroom, like the kitchen, is modern and includes a spacious walk-in shower, sink, and towel radiator. The toilet is separate and accessible from the hallway. It is also worth mentioning that the washing machine and dryer connections are located separately in the spacious utility room within the apartment, keeping the bathroom uncluttered with only the essential fixtures. 
 The property has two spacious bedrooms and a large storage room on the ground floor of the complex. 
 DETAILS 
 
 This property is offered for an indefinite period with a minimum contract duration of 12 months. 
 Parking possible on own parking space 
 This property scores sufficient points in the WWS point system to be offered in the private sector. A current points breakdown will be made available to the tenant at the start of the lease. 
 This property has an A+++ energy label. 
 This property includes a spacious storage room on the ground floor of the complex. 
 Free parking is available in the immediate vicinity of the building. 
 
 SELECTION PROCEDURE: 
 Rotsvast determines which candidates responded first based on incoming emails. Given the expected high volume of responses, not all candidates can be invited. This email must contain at least the following information: 
 
 Name(s) of tenant(s) 
 Description of household composition 
 Gross annual income of tenant(s) 
 
 Responses that do not meet these requirements will not be processed. 
 Viewings are scheduled in the order in which responses are received; space is limited. 
 After the viewing, income and reliability screenings will be conducted through various (public) registers. Tenants must fully complete this screening with the best possible score, 5 stars, in our screening tool (Properize). The choice to rent the property to candidates is entirely up to the owner of the property. If multiple candidates pass the screening successfully, the choice will be based on income, screening results, and the personal situation of the tenant. As a tenant, you will have the opportunity to explain your personal situation during the screening. 
 Candidates who are not selected for the property after screening are entitled to further clarification and can review the screening report. 
 PLEASE NOTE:  Rotsvast represents the interests of the owner, who prefers to rent by the available date. After completing the screening, Rotsvast will promptly propose a dossier to the owner. If a dossier is already accepted, subsequent completed dossiers will not be considered in the process. It is the responsibility of candidate tenants to submit a complete dossier as quickly as possible. Rotsvast will not actively inform tenants about the progress of the ongoing screening process of other candidate tenants. In a competitive housing market, Rotsvast assumes that candidate tenants are aware of the importance of acting promptly. 
 Are you interested in this rental property? Contact Rotsvast Gouda to schedule an appointment!

description:
Description 

                                                         Binnenkort is deze eengezinswoning in de Literatuurwijk beschikbaar op loopafstand van de internationale basis school Letterland, kinderdagverblijf, openbaar vervoer, een grote Vomar supermarkt, Actifit wellness center en sportschool en Apotheek Archipel. 
De woning is zeer netjes en ook erg geschikt voor een expat gezin. De woning wordt gestoffeerd opgeleverd met complementair een wasmachine en wasdroger. De woning is keurig afgewerkt en valt direct te betrekken. 
De woning heeft 4 kamers waarvan 3 ruime slaapkamers. Alle kamers hebben een coax aansluiting voor (digitale)televisie en de woning kan ook worden aangesloten op een glasvezel netwerk voor internet met 1 gigabit up en down snelheid. 
Verder heeft de woning 2 badkamers (waarvan er 1 ensuite de slaapkamer beneden zit) met daarin een toilet en ligbad met douche en een apart toilet in de hal beneden! Ook is er nog een ruime berging met opbergkast. 
 De woning ligt in een zeer kindvriendelijke straat zonder langsrijdende auto's en met een speelveld naast de deur. Parkeren kan 20 meter verderop in de aanliggende straat. 
De A6 snelweg is in 4 minuten te bereiken en Amsterdam ligt 12 minuten verder. 
Met het openbaar vervoer is Amsterdam Zuid in 39 minuten te bereiken en Amsterdam centraal station in 41 minuten. 
 Begane grond: 
Entree via de hal met garderobekast en een apart toilet. Daarnaast is de toegang tot de ruime woonkamer met veel licht door de grote raam partijen aan de voor en achterkant. 
Direct aan de woonkamer is de luxe open keuken voorzien van een vaatwasser, magnetron met oven, koelkast met aparte vriezer en een 4 pits koopplaat met afzuigkap. De keuken heeft ook diverse kastjes inclusief een le mans kast onder de trap zodat er veel ruimte is voor het opslaan voor keukengerei. 
Naast de woonkamer is een ruime slaapkamer waarvan de wanden gemakkelijk te verwijderen zijn zodat deze om te bouwen valt naar b.v. een eetkamer. De slaapkamer heeft een eigen badkamer met toilet en ligbad met douche en daarnaast een wasruimte met de complementaire wasmachine en wasdroger. 
De woonkamer bied toegang tot de patio aan de achterkant met een ligging op het zuid westen waar het 's zomers heerlijk vertoeven is in alle privacy. 
De ruime berging aan de zijkant van de woning is zowel vanuit de patio bereikbaar als via de voorkant van de woning. 
De gehele begane grond is voorzien van een mooie tegelvloer met een luxe uitstraling. 
De trap naar de 1e verdieping zit heel gunstig centraal aan de woonkamer. 
 1e verdieping: 
Een lange en lichte hal met aangrenzend een ruime badkamer met daarin een toilet, ligbad met douche, een aparte douchecabine en dubbele spoelbakken, opbergkasten en designradiator. Ook zijn er 2 ruime slaapkamers bereikbaar via de hal. De hal en slaapkamers zijn voorzien van een nette laminaatvloer. 
 Engels; 
Description 
 Soon this single-family home in the Literatuurwijk is available within walking distance of the international primary school Letterland, daycare center, public transport, a large Vomar supermarket, Actifit wellness center and gym and pharmacy Archipel. 
The property is very neat and also very suitable for an expat family. The house will be delivered unfurnished with a washing machine and tumble dryer complementary. The house is nicely finished and ready to move into. 
The property has 4 rooms including 3 spacious bedrooms. All rooms have a coax connection for (digital) television and the home can also be connected to a fiber optic network for internet with 1 gigabit up and down speed. 
Furthermore, the house has 2 bathrooms (one of which ensuite to the bedroom below) with a toilet and bath with shower and a separate toilet in the hall below! There is also a spacious store room with storage cupboard. 
 The house is in a very child-friendly street with no cars passing by and with a playing field next door. You can park your cars 20 meters away in the adjacent street. 
The A6 motorway can be reached within 4 minutes and Amsterdam is 12 minutes away. 
Amsterdam station Zuid can be reached in 39 minutes by public transport and Amsterdam Central Station in 41 minutes. 
 Ground floor: 
Entrance through the hall with wardrobe and a separate toilet. In addition, access to the spacious living room with lots of light through the large windows at the front and back. 
Directly next to the living room is the luxurious open kitchen with a dishwasher, microwave with oven, fridge with separate freezer and a 4-burner plate with cooking hood. The kitchen also has various cupboards including a le mans cupboard under the stairs so that there is plenty of room for storing kitchen utensils. 
Next to the living room is a spacious bedroom that can also be easily converted into for example a dining room by removing the bedroomwalls. The bedroom has its own bathroom with toilet and bathtub with shower, as well as a laundry room with the complementary washing machine and dryer. 
The living room has access to the patio at the back via a sliding door which is oriented on the south west where it is wonderful to spend the summer in privacy. 
The spacious storage room on the side of the house is accessible both from the patio and through the front of the house. 
The entire ground floor has a beautiful tiled floor with a luxurious appearance. 
The stairs to the 1st floor are very conveniently located centrally in the living room. 
 1st floor: 
A long and light hall with an adjoining spacious bathroom with a toilet, bath with shower, a separate shower cabin and double sinks, storage cupboards and design radiator. There are also 2 spacious bedrooms accessible via the hall. The hall and bedrooms have a nice laminate floor.

 Description provided by lessor and conditions: 
 Leuk gemeubileerd appartement met balkon op het zuiden, gesitueerd in galerijflat 'Koningsresidentie'. Het is gelegen langs de "Groene Loper" nabij diverse winkels en voorzieningen; bovendien bevindt het appartement zich op loopafstand van het stadscentrum en het treinstation van Maastricht. 
 Indeling 
 Begane grond: 
 - Centrale entree met bellentableau, brievenbussen, trappenhuis en liften. 
 2e woonlaag (appartement 53C): 
 - Slaapkamer aan de galerij-zijde met ingebouwd bed, ladekasten en een muurkast. 
 - Betegelde badkamer met douche, toilet en wastafel. 
 - Woonkamer met aansluitend een balkon op het zuiden. 
 - Half open keuken met een complete keukeninrichting en voorzien van. onder andere. een 4-pits gaskookplaat, afzuigkap en koelkast. 
 - Berghok inclusief elektrische boiler en wasmachine. 
 Souterrain: 
 - Gemeenschappelijke afgesloten fietsenstalling. 
 ALGEMEEN 
 - Vanaf het balkon geniet men van een mooi uitzicht op de 'Groene loper' 
 - Voldoende parkeergelegenheid rondom het complex. 
 - Netto woonoppervlakte appartement: 38m². 
 - Plafondhoogte: 2,62m. 
 KENMERKEN 
 Interieur: het appartement is voorzien van stoffering, diverse meubels, lampen en keukenapparatuur. 
 Rental price 
 The rental price is excluding gas/water/electricity and excluding service costs. 
 Upholstery costs 
 The upholstery costs for the house are €60,- per month. 
 Furnished costs 
 The furnished costs for the house is €86 per month. 
 Service costs for user (including an advance payment for heating costs, water, and internet). The service costs for the user of the apartment is a total of €264,- per month. 
 Deposit 
 At the start of the rental agreement, a deposit is required. 
 The apartment will be rented through 'Overbruggingsverhuur'. Overbruggingsverhuur provides a temporary rental agreement for properties. There is no waiting list and we offer well-kept houses for an affordable rent. 
 Rental period 
 The rental period is 7 months. 
 General information 
 In order to rent an Overbruggingsverhuur rental house, the tenant has to meet certain conditions. A summary of these conditions is outlined below. 
 Conditions regarding house hold income 
 To meet the income requirement, your net income will need to be approx. 3 times the rental price. Any other payment commitments (for example debt collection agency) will be deducted from the house hold income. Another possibility to meet this requirement is to pay a higher deposit. 
 Questions about the property? 
 You can contact the landlord for all these questions. 
 ************************************************ 
 Register gas and electricity? 
 When allocating the house, the utilities must be registered in the name of the tenant. By responding to a property, a candidate tenant / interested party also gives permission to be informed through us of the cheapest energy suppliers. 
 Disclaimer 
Er kunnen geen rechten worden ontleend aan de aangeboden informatie. Indien u zekerheid wenst te hebben over de verstrekte informatie en de actualiteit daarvan, dient u contact op te nemen met Overbruggingsverhuur (huren@). Overbruggingsverhuur kan niet aansprakelijk worden gesteld voor eventuele gevolgen of schade verband houdende met de aangeboden informatie.

description:
Description 

                                                         A luxurious 4-room apartment of 124m2 on the 6th floor at the Nico Koomanskade with 2 walk-in showers, a walk-in closet, a roof terrace, a storage room and a parking space. This fully furnished house has a surface of 124 square meters and combines modern comfort with timeless elegance. 
 Key Features: Shared entrance with mailboxes, doorbells and access to the elevators. Entrance apartment on the 6th floor. The spacious living room is designed for both relaxation and entertainment, with ample seating and a large flat-screen TV. The living room is bathed in natural light from large windows, which also offer stunning views of the cityscape from the large balcony. Modern Kitchen: The open-plan kitchen features high-end appliances, sleek cabinetry and a stylish island with a breakfast bar. The kitchen flows seamlessly into the dining area, making it perfect for dining. There are 3 spacious bedrooms. The master bedroom has a walk-in closet for added convenience. Luxurious Bathroom: Enjoy the convenience of two walk-in showers, each designed with modern fixtures and high-end finishes. The bathroom offers a spa-like experience with ample space and elegant design. Rooftop Terrace: Step out onto the expansive rooftop terrace to enjoy breathtaking views of the city and surrounding areas. It is an ideal spot for alfresco dining, lounging or simply enjoying the scenery. The rooftop terrace is accessible from the master bedroom as well as the living room and kitchen. Parking and storage : The property has its own parking space and additional storage space, so you have plenty of room for all your belongings. Underfloor heating : Stay warm and comfortable all year round with the integrated underfloor heating system, which provides efficient and even heat distribution throughout the apartment. Situated in a vibrant neighborhood, this apartment offers easy access to local amenities, parks and public transport. Whether you are looking for a luxurious permanent residence or a stylish urban retreat, this property has everything you need for a comfortable and sophisticated lifestyle.

                                                         U HEEFT EEN OBJECTCODE NODIG ALS U ONS BELT. DE CODE IS: 8 0 0 0 4 
 BezichtigingWij plannen alleen een bezichtiging wanneer u een Qii account heeft aangemaakt en uw gegevens via DigiD aan ons, ter inzage, heeft vrijgegeven. 
 LET OP: Minimaal inkomen van € 66.240,-  
 Viewing We will only schedule a viewing if you have created a Qii account and released your details to us for inspection with DigiD.  
 Omschrijving Een ruim 3 kamer appartement gelegen in het Centrum van Zaandam.   
  Indeling 
 Gezamenlijke entree met trappenhuis en lift.  Hal met doorloop naar de slaapkamer(s), separaat toilet, badkamer, interne berging, woonkamer met luxe open keuken. Externe berging.  
 Bijzonderheden  
 Beschikbaar eind november  
 Bouwjaar 2011  
 Label A  
 Lift wel aanwezig  
 3e etage  
 2 slaapkamers  
 Luxe keuken met inbouwapparatuur  
 Badkamer met douche en bad  
 Inpandig en externe berging  
 Appartement wordt ongemeubileerd verhuurd  
 Huurder dient zelf zorg te dragen voor het sauzen of behangen van de muren en wanden en het leggen van een vloerbedekking  
 Huurprijs is exclusief servicekosten van € 67,82 per maand  
 Naamplaatje indien het een woning in een complex betreft (éénmalig) € 16,50 
 Huurder dient zelf gas en/of elektra en water aan te vragen 
  Inkomenseis  
 Kredietwaardig en voldoet aan inkomensnormen (48x de netto huur als bruto jaarinkomen); 
 Bij één inkomen dient het bruto jaarsalaris minimaal ca. 48 keer de maandhuur van de woning te zijn (bij deze woning van € 1.380,- huur per maand, is het bruto jaarsalaris dus minimaal  € 66.240-). Bij twee inkomens dienen de twee bruto jaarsalarissen samen minimaal 48 keer de maandhuur van de woning te zijn. 
 Waarborgsom van tweemaal de netto huur € 2.760,- 
 Huurperiode  
 Een huurovereenkomst voor ten minste één jaar en wordt daarna automatisch verlengd voor onbepaalde tijd; 
 Na de minimale huurperiode van één jaar bedraagt de opzegtermijn voor de huurder één maand;  
 De huurperiode kan op elke dag van de maand ingaan. Yvastgoed bepaald de ingangsdatum van de huur.

description:
Description 

                                                         In the child-friendly neighborhood Getsewoud in Nieuw-Vennep, we offer this spacious 4-bedroom family house for rent. The house is conveniently located with respect to shopping centers, schools and motorways and has a lovely garden with spacious (bicycle) storage and back entrance. The house is rented partially furnished for a period of at least 12 and maximum 60 months.   
 Ground floor: Entrance in the hall of the house, where the modern separate toilet with sink is located. 
At the end of the hall you can enter the spacious living room. The living room is wonderfully light due to the large windows and patio doors along the back. The backyard can also be entered from here. The modern open kitchen is situated at the front of the house. It is equipped with built-in appliances, namely; fridge/freezer, dishwasher, induction hob with extractor hood, oven, microwave oven and coffee machine. Here you will also find the dining area with a view of the neighborhood through the large windows at the front. 
The garden faces northwest and has a detached, wooden (bicycle) storage shed and a back entrance.   
 First floor: From the landing there is access to three of the bedrooms, including the master bedroom. One of the bedrooms is furnished as an office/study space, which is perfect for working from home. The bathroom has a toilet, corner bath, towel radiator, sink with cupboard and mirror and a shower.   
 Second floor: The connection for the washing equipment is located on the landing. The last two bedrooms can also be reached, both of which are spacious and have dormer windows.   
 Specifications: 
- Quiet, child-friendly neighboorhood 
- Close to supermarkets, schools and motorways 
- Modern kitchen 
- Garden with (bicycle) storage and back entrance 
- Non-smoking house 
- No pets 
- Partly furnished 
- Available for a minimum of 12 and a maximum of 60 months 
- Rent excluding G/W/E/TV, internet and municipal charges 
- Allocation subject to landlord's approval

description:
Description 

                                                         Stylish 3-Bedroom Apartment in the Heart of Eindhoven 
 Location:  3rd floor, modern apartment complex 
 This nicely finished 3-bedroom apartment combines optimal comfort with a central location in the heart of Eindhoven. Located on the 3rd floor of a well-maintained complex, the apartment has a private parking space in the secure area behind the building. The complex is equipped with an elevator and offers a private storage room on the first floor for extra storage space. 
Layout of the Apartment.
 Entrance:  The apartment is accessed via a covered gallery, which offers extra shelter. 
 Hallway:  The hall is equipped with an intercom system and provides access to a separate toilet room with hand basin. There is also a storage room with connections for washer and dryer, and space for the central heating system and mechanical ventilation. 
 Living room:  The bright and spacious living room has large windows for plenty of natural light and gives access to a sunny balcony, perfect for relaxing and sitting outside. 
 Kitchen:  The open kitchen is fully equipped with modern appliances, including a dishwasher, oven, refrigerator, freezer and gas hob. 
 Bedrooms:  Both bedrooms are spacious and located at the front of the apartment, ideal for a peaceful night's sleep. 
 Bathroom:  The neat, bright bathroom features a shower and sink. 
Location Features and Accessibility.
Location Features and Accessibility.
 
 Location:  In the heart of Eindhoven, with stores, schools, parks, restaurants and theaters within walking distance. 
 Excellent connections:  TU Eindhoven, the High Tech Campus, ASML, MMC and Fontys Hogescholen are nearby, as well as the access roads A2/A67 and public transport facilities. 
 Maintenance:  The apartment is part of a well-maintained complex with a common entrance, an elevator, and an enclosed parking lot for extra security. 
 
 This apartment offers the perfect combination of comfort and central location, ideal for those who want to enjoy everything Eindhoven has to offer.

description:
Description 

                                                         Have you ever dreamed of living in a medieval castle, but with all the modern comforts? Welcome to Kolmonderstraat 22A, a fully renovated home on the enchanting grounds of Nijswiller Castle in Wittem. Picture yourself waking up to stunning views of the historic castle, taking peaceful walks with a cup of coffee by the river in your backyard and its charming stone bridge, while enjoying access to the beautiful and private castle grounds. 
 This spacious 152 m² home offers 4 bedrooms with AC and 4 bathrooms (including 1 bathtub and 4 showers), perfect for both families and professionals who seek a balance of character and modernity. With underfloor heating, energy label A, and practical amenities, you'll be living the dream of castle life with all the conveniences of a well-equipped home. 
 Nijswiller is located minutes drive from the highway and 10 minutes from Aachen (near the RWTH Campus / Klinikum). The location is central ‘Heuvelland’ (land of hills), a touristic destination in the Netherlands. Minutes walk to public transport. 
 Key details: 
Rent: €2,950 per month (plus €150 for electricity and €150 for service costs, which include underfloor heating, hot water, internet, park lighting, and park maintenance). 
Deposit: 2 months' rent. 
Energy label: A 
Airconditioning: A+++ in every room. 
Outdoor space: small private garden. Castle grounds, and on-site parking. 
Availability: immediately. 
Pet policy: Cats allowed (no dogs). 
Smoking: non smoking. 
EV charging: available on request. 
Minimum stay: 6 months. 
Furnishing: unfurnished. 
No home sharers. 
 You’ll have plenty of privacy while being part of a friendly international expat community. Ideal for working professionals and couples with kids. This is your chance to live in a unique and magical setting, combining history and comfort in one of the most charming locations in the Netherlands! 
 Future Potential: Purchase of the apartment may be possible in the future, offering you an opportunity to make this fairy-tale setting your permanent home. 
The non-binding information shown on this website has been compiled by us (with care). We do not guarantee its accuracy or completeness. We advise you and/or your estate agent to contact us if you are interested in one of our properties. We are not responsible for the content of websites referred to. 
 This information has been carefully compiled by us. No liability is accepted for any incompleteness, inaccuracy or otherwise, or the consequences thereof. All measurements and dimensions are indicative and not exact according to the NEN-2580 standard.
