Description 

                                                         310163 
 NB! You can only request a viewing online via this website. 
 Mention the 7 answers to these questions in your viewing request (without these 7 answers, a viewing is not possible): 
 
 Number of adults who will live in the house? 
 Number of children who will live in the house? 
 Do you have pets, if so? Which? 
 Amount of the joint net monthly income? 
 Can you pay an increased deposit if you have insufficient income? 
 The reason for moving? 
 By when you want to move into the house? 
 
 Rental price 
The rental price is excluding gas/water/electricity, but including service costs. 
 Deposit 
At the start of the rental agreement, a deposit is required. 
The apartment will be rented through 'Overbruggingsverhuur'. Overbruggingsverhuur provides a temporary rental agreement for properties that are for sale, based on the legal requirements of the 'Leegstandwet'. There is no waiting list and we offer well-kept houses for an affordable rent. 
 Rental period 
The minimum rental period is 6 months up to a maximum for the duration of the permit according to the 'Leegstandwet'. 
 General information 
In order to rent an Overbruggingsverhuur rental house, the tenant has to meet certain conditions. A summary of these conditions is outlined below. 
 Conditions regarding house hold income 
To meet the income requirement, your net income will need to be approx.3 times the rental price. Any other payment commitments (for example debt collection agency) will be deducted from the house hold income. Another possibility to meet this requirement is to pay a higher deposit. 
 Questions about the property? 
You can contact the landlord for all these questions.

                                                         Unique ground floor apartment with a spacious city garden located in the center of Nijmegen. This 2-room apartment offers a vibrant urban living experience, surrounded by cozy restaurants, bars, and shops. The Kronenburgerpark, Plein 44, and the lively Lange Hezelstraat are just steps away. The apartment is also within short cycling distance from Radboud University and within walking distance of Central Station. 
 The partially furnished apartment (60m2) includes a living room, a bedroom, a kitchen, a bathroom with toilet, and a spacious garden (38m2). 
 Layout 
 The kitchen is equipped with a gas hob, stainless steel extractor, dishwasher, oven, refrigerator, and kitchenware. 
 The bathroom includes a walk-in shower, sink, toilet, washing machine, and dryer.

description:
Description 

                                                         VIEWINGS 
 It's possible to view the model apartment (Weverstede 649) on Monday and Friday mornings between 9:00 and 11:00. Want to take a peek inside? Send us a message or simply drop by! 
 ABOUT THE WELL 
Become the first resident of The Well, a sustainable new residential complex in the heart of Nieuwegein. The project consists of two residential towers with 240 apartments, ranging from 46 to 88 m². 
 The Well has a prime location in the city center of Nieuwegein, next to the Cityplaza shopping center. This mall features several supermarkets, shops, and a gym. Eight trams per hour run from Nieuwegein to Utrecht. A new tram and bus station is currently under construction, providing direct connections to Utrecht’s city center once completed. 
 ABOUT THE APARTMENT 
This stylish and spacious apartment offers a modern and comfortable living experience. The apartment is unfurnished, allowing you the freedom to decorate it to your own taste. 
 You enter the apartment through a large hallway, which leads to the living room. The living room is spacious and features a modern open kitchen. The kitchen is fully equipped with high-quality appliances, including a dishwasher, fridge-freezer combo, and a combi-oven. 
 From the living room, you can access the spacious bedroom. Both the living room and bedroom provide access to the loggia, where you can create a cozy sitting area. 
 The hallway also gives access to the bathroom, which is finished with white wall tiles and gray floor tiles. The bathroom includes a walk-in shower, sink, and mirror. The toilet is separate. Lastly, there is a storage room with technical installations and connections for your washing machine and dryer. This storage space is ideal for storing your personal belongings. 
 Good to know 
 
 Walls are finished with white wallpaper 
 You will need to install flooring (PVC or laminate) 
 Curtains are already installed 
 Heating, water, electricity, internet, and TV are not included. You must arrange these utilities yourself. 
 
 The Well has a large bicycle storage area and an underground parking garage (with shared cars). Additionally, The Well features a beautiful rooftop garden on the fifth floor and shares a courtyard with The New Citizen and Ivy Apartments. These are perfect spots to relax with fellow residents. 
 ABOUT THE CONTRACT 
 
 Indefinite, minimum stay of 12 months 
 Minimum income is approx. 4x the rent 
 Deposit is approx. 1x the rent
house_name: For rent: Flat Weverstede in Nieuwegein

                                                         DECEMBER 15TH: BEAUTIFUL DETACHED HOUSE & CONSERVATORY & LARGE STORAGE, NEAR THE HAGUE & ROTTERDAM 
 Located in Kwintsheul in the Westland is this special and spacious detached house (ENERGY LABEL B). The house has a living area of 238 m2 and is located on a spacious plot of 1470 m2 (built in 2003). The house is within cycling distance of the center of Kwintsheul. In addition, the nearest exit road is only an 8-minute drive away. You are in the center of The Hague in 20 minutes, in the center of Rotterdam in 25 minutes. International School The Hague (ISH) is 10 km away and you are in 18 minutes. 
 Layout: 
 Via the driveway, with locked gate, a spacious front garden with plenty of parking space (also large carport). 
 Ground floor: 
 Front door, spacious hall with access to all rooms. Door towards the spacious garage. Door to the living room. Spacious living room, with tiled floor with underfloor heating, beautiful fireplace with gas fire, with many windows, making the house very light. Through the living room to the spacious kitchen with island. The kitchen is equipped with a gas stove with large oven, microwave, large fridge-freezer combination, lots of cupboard space for enough storage space. The dining table can be placed in the beautifully attached conservatory, which can be opened over the width of the house. There is a very spacious garden around the house, with beautiful play equipment for children and a beautiful canopy. The spacious shed (approximately 50 m2) can be reached from the carport, for bicycles and other items. 
 1st floor: 
 In the house you go to the 1st floor with the stairs. At the front is 1st bedroom with fitted wardrobe, space for a double bed, via the landing to bedroom 2, where there is space for a single bed, wardrobe and desk. The bathroom has a large walk-in shower, washbasin with double sink and a toilet. In bedroom 3 there is room for a single bed, wardrobe and desk, in bedroom 4 there is room for a single bed, wardrobe and desk. Next to the bathroom there is a separate laundry room. On this floor there is beautiful laminate with wood structure on the floors on the landing and the bedrooms. 
 2nd floor: 
 Large loft with loft ladder, for storage of things. 
 Rent: € 3,250,-- per month excl. gas, electricity, water TV/INT. Rental period: indefinite period, rent minimum 12 months. Deposit: 1.5 months rent.

description:
Description 

                                                         A bright and well maintained fully furnished 2 bedroom apartment in the most charming part of the center of The Hague with a spectaculair view over one of the beautiful Dutch canals. 
 The location is amazing. Buurtschap 2005 is the historical part of The Hague with lovely narrow streets where you will find a variety of restaurants, trendy shops, art galleries en alongside the canal you can have your cup of coffee or a glass of wine on one of the beautiful terraces. 
Walking through the streets like the Denneweg and the Lange Voorhout, you can enjoy the beautiful historical facades of the houses that go back in the 18 century. 
 It is just a 10 minutes walk tot the central station. There are several tram and bus connections. By car you are on the highway to Amsterdam, Utrecht and Rotterdam within 5 minutes. With your bike you can reach the beach of Scheveningen within 15 minutes or take the tram. International companies and organizations like Europol, Shell, NATO, ICC and Eurojust can easily be reached by bike or tram. 
 Lay-out : central entrance of a small scale apartment building, stairs to the 3rd floor, entrance apartment with a spacious hallway with separate toilet and built-in closet, at the front side a bright living room with an open view over the canal, modern and light eat-in kitchen with all modern appliances, at the back the master bedroom and a beautiful bathroom with bathtub, separate shower and washbasin, stairs to the spacious top floor with a second large bedroom with study space and an extra room with good storage space and the washing machine. 
 This lovely apartment is worth a visit and is perfect for people who enjoy Dutch city life! 
 Special features: 
 
 bike storage 
 full double glazing 
 walking distance of the city center and the central station 
 fully-furnished 
 the rent is excluding utilities 
 for a single or a couple 
 not suitable for children

Various shops and restaurants as well as train and bus station Leidse Rijn Centrum are easily accessible from this location.

Not only through the large windows, but also through the sliding doors, a lot of light enters the property. The spacious, south facing balcony offers a beautiful view over Utrecht and the Leidse Rijn district. The luxurious open kitchen is situated at the rear of the living room. The two bedrooms and a spacious storage cupboard can be reached via the hallway. The bathroom is also accessible, which is equipped with a shower, a sink with furniture and a design radiator.

Thus, museums, theater and various sports activities, within walking distance to find or you can go for a nice walk in the nearby Wilhelmina Park and Nonnenveld. 
 Besides culture, there are also many opportunities for hospitality lovers in the immediate vicinity, so you can think of the around the corner Noir, Figo or Bardot. For daily shopping you can go to the Albert Heijn on the Ginnekenweg.

Upon entering you are immediately in the bright room where, thanks to the three large windows, you experience a spacious and open atmosphere. The space consists of a living room at the front, kitchen and bedroom at the rear with access to a spacious roof terrace. The kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, oven, fridge-freezer and stove with built-in extractor. The boiler is located in a separate cabinet in the kitchen. 
 Through the bedroom is the bathroom to reach. The bathroom has underfloor heating, a walk-in shower with rain shower and a toilet. You will also find here a connection for the washing machine. Throughout the living room is equipped with luxury PVC lining. 
 The Wilhelminastraat is a unique shopping street, with a wide range of over 30 different stores. All stores are in the middle to high segment and therefore offer only high quality products. The vibrant city center of Breda is within walking distance as well as the cozy Ginneken and the Mastbos.

description:
Description 

                                                         Luxury "turn-key" two bedroom apartment with a stunning location beautiful view in new urban district of Hyde Park!  
 We are proud to present this well-designed "turn-key" apartment with two bedrooms in the beloved new development of Hyde Park, Kensington. This corner apartment of 72m², located on the third floor with a southwest sun orientation, offers a unique location with beautiful views within the new urban district of Hyde Park. 
 T O U R: 
At "Kensington Five", you enter the building through the impressive six-meter high entrance on the ground floor. This entrance, with a modern design, leads you to two elevators that take you to the third floor. Through the spacious hallway, you will find a luxurious separate toilet, a bathroom equipped with Porcelanosa tiles and high-quality Duravit materials, and a large internal storage room. The master bedroom is equipped with high-quality custom-built wardrobes and adjoins a lovely lockable outdoor space. Thanks to the numerous large windows and the corner location, the living room with open kitchen benefits from plenty of natural light. The outdoor space is accessible from the living room and has a pleasant south-facing sun orientation. The modern kitchen is fully equipped with all conveniences and appliances. Additionally, the second bedroom can serve well as an office. The apartment also has a practical storage room separate from the external storage in the basement. 
 L O C A T I O N: 
Hyde Park offers a groundbreaking new development that sets a new standard for contemporary living. A complete new urban district in a unique living environment where comfort and convenience come together. Amenities such as restaurants, cafes, a gym, wellness center, and supermarket are all within easy reach. The shops in the center of Hoofddorp are also nearby. 
 Hyde Park provides an ideal location for commuters, with excellent connections to major cities like Amsterdam, Haarlem, and The Hague, as well as to Schiphol Airport. This location is perfect for those who work in the city but want to enjoy the tranquility and space of a green environment. The train station is within walking distance, providing quick access to your destination: 4 minutes to Schiphol, 12 minutes to the Zuidas, and just over 20 minutes to Amsterdam Central. Haarlem, The Hague, and Leiden are all reachable within 30 minutes. 
 F E A T U R E S: 
 
 Usage area approx. 72 m² in accordance with NEN2580 guidelines 
 Energy label A+ 
 Turn-Key & immediately available 
 Two spacious bedrooms with ample natural light 
 Luxury bathroom 
 External storage of 6 m² 
 Underfloor heating and cooling 
 Fully gas-free and future-proof 
 Stylish and contemporary design with high-quality finishes 
 Beautifully landscaped park, sports facilities, and shops within walking distance 
 Excellent connections to major cities and Schiphol Airport. 
 Options to rent a private parking space in the underground garage

description:
Description 

                                                         New for rent! 
 A beautiful, monumental building on the edge of Naarden-Vesting, just 20 minutes from Amsterdam, available for temporary rental from January 1st to March 31st, 2025. 
 This monumental building from 1840, with a spacious living area of 269 m², exudes authentic charm and character, combined with modern luxury. The high ceilings, original details and stately appearance give the house a unique atmosphere, while it is equipped with all modern conveniences to make your stay as pleasant as possible. Surrounded by greenery, the area offers plenty of opportunities for walking and cycling, while the rooms overlook the iconic monument "De Utrechtse Poort" with its fountain. Within a few minutes you can walk to the cozy restaurants, cafes and shops of the fortified city. 
 CONDITIONS: 
 - Available: January 1st to March 31st, 2025 
- Rental period: maximum 3 months 
- Rental price: €6500 incl. g/w/e 
- Furnished 
- Deposit: equal to one month's rent 
 LOCATION: 
 This unique property is located in the historic Naarden-Vesting, a beloved fortified city known for its iconic city walls and charming atmosphere. Within walking distance are various restaurants, cafes and shops, as well as the famous monument "De Utrechtse Poort" with fountain. The central location ensures that cities such as Amsterdam and Utrecht are easily accessible. 
 DETAILS: 
 - Monumental building from 1840 
- Living area: 269 m² 
- Stately appearance with modern conveniences 
- Spacious rooms with private bathrooms, coffee maker, refrigerator and crockery 
- Three bathrooms 
- Independent unit on the attic floor with separate bedroom and balcony 
 LAYOUT: 
 - Ground floor: spacious Bulthaup kitchen with high-quality built-in appliances and adjoining conservatory, ideal for dinners, meetings or working in an atmospheric setting. 
 - Multiple private workspaces spread throughout the house, perfect for quiet working moments. 
 - Outside area: the backyard offers a covered terrace with heaters, so that you can also sit outside on colder evenings and enjoy the peaceful surroundings. 
 - Parking: free parking in the dead-end street behind the building, including charging points for electric cars. 
 - Surroundings: every Saturday there is a cozy market next to the house, which emphasizes the unique atmosphere of Naarden-Vesting even more. 
 This house offers an exceptional combination of historical charm, modern comfort and a top location. Ideal for a temporary stay in a peaceful and inspiring environment. 
 Although this text has been carefully drafted, no rights can be derived from this text. Dimensions are indicative and not NEN measured. Award subject to approval by landlord / owner. Deposit amount may vary, depending on profile. Pets in consultation. Smoking not allowed. Fixed-term rental agreement. General terms and conditions of ROZ apply.

                                                         3-BEDROOM APARTMENT | UNFURNISHED | ENERGY LABEL A+ | LIFT | 4TH FLOOR 
 Displayed photos are of a similar property 
 No guarantor option available 
 Viewings can only be requested via email. 
 Light, space, and a view! Always wanted to live by the IJ? Then this is the perfect place for you. 
 This lovely 3-bedroom apartment at the NDSM Wharf is directly located by the IJ in Amsterdam. Pontkade was built in 2020 as part of a new project on the NDSM Wharf in Amsterdam. Pontkade is characterized by two towers positioned around the inner courtyard, connected to 8 deck houses. It was even named one of the ten most beautiful projects built in Amsterdam in the past year. The location is at the harbor, allowing you to reach Amsterdam Centraal within a few minutes by ferry. 
 Features: 
The apartment is equipped with a high-quality PVC floor and a modern kitchen with built-in appliances, such as: an induction cooktop, extractor hood, dishwasher, combination microwave, and a fridge-freezer or fridge with freezer compartment. All apartments are also equipped with automatic design sunscreens and underfloor heating. The bathroom is fully tiled to the ceiling and features a walk-in shower and sink. The apartment has a separate toilet. Additionally, the apartment includes a balcony facing the northwest. 
 Conditions: 
• Deposit: equal to 2 months' rent. 
• Service charges: €75.00 
• Contract type: A – minimum 12 months 
• Energy label: A+ 
• Rent increase: CPI + 1% 
• Contract type: liberalized 
• WOZ value: 01/01/2023 --> €411,000 
 Specifications: 
• Apartment located on the 4th floor 
• Underfloor heating throughout the apartment 
• High-quality PVC floor 
• Lift 
• Communal bike storage 
• Stunning view over the IJ 
• Kitchen with built-in appliances 
• Double glazing 
 Allocation: 
• Income requirement: 3.5 times the rent as monthly gross income 
• No pets allowed 
• No guarantor option 
 Location and accessibility: 
The NDSM wharf is a lively square on the banks of the IJ. Here, you can relax with your favorite coffee to-go on a bench, enjoy the sun by the water, and have a spectacular view across the IJ towards Amsterdam. 
 With the free ferries, you can reach Amsterdam Central or Houthaven in 15 minutes, and the Pontsteiger in 5 minutes. By car, you can reach the A10 in 10 minutes via the Klaprozenweg and S118. On a nice day, you could also choose to take a boat ride. 
 For daily shopping, take the lift downstairs, as the ground floor of Pontkade is designated for shops, including an AH supermarket, a bakery, IJscuypje, offices, and restaurants. If you're in the mood for lunch, a drink, or a nice meal out, you can visit one of the exciting dining spots on the wharf, such as Pllek, Noorderlicht, Loetje, CanibaleXL, etc.

In some cases, photos of a similar property or apartment are used for illustration purposes. No rights can be derived from the text, floor plans, photos, and measurements.

 Description 
 This lovely and modern family home, built in 2001, is located on Bernard Zweershof in Uithoorn. With a living space of 93 m² on a 123 m² plot, this terraced house offers a cozy and practical in the desirable Wijk 45 Legmeer neighborhood. The home includes three rooms, two spacious bedrooms, a well-kept bathroom, and a separate toilet. With an energy label A, this house offers energy-efficient living in a peaceful and family-friendly setting. 
 Lay-out 
 The house has a smart and efficient layout, making great use of its 93 m² of living space. The ground floor features a bright and welcoming living room, alongside a modern kitchen with a separate toilet. Upstairs, you’ll find two well-sized bedrooms and a sleek bathroom. Outside, the property provides space for relaxation or light gardening. 
 Location 
 Located in the quiet and sought-after Wijk 45 Legmeer neighborhood, this home offers a great balance between suburban and easy access to Uithoorn’s vibrant center. The area is known for being family-friendly, with plenty of amenities nearby such as schools, daycare centers, playgrounds, and parks, all within walking distance. Bernard Zweershof 10 is ideal for those seeking a peaceful home, while still having shops, supermarkets, and local restaurants just a short drive or bike ride away. 
 Transportation 
 This property is well-connected, with a bus stop a short walk away providing easy access to Uithoorn’s center and beyond. Major highways are just a few minutes away by car, making commuting simple. For those who need to travel by train, the nearest station is a short drive away. 
 Amenities

- Built-in 2001
garden: Present (25 m², located on the south-east)

description:
Description 

                                                         Gorgeous refurbished and upholstered apartment with 2 bedrooms, 1 office/walk in closet, 2 French (Juliet) balconies of around 70 m2 on a quiet location in the popular Oud-West on the edge of Jorda... 
 For this precious apartment we are looking to find a tenant who takes great care of the place as well as one to enjoy its great location and its versatile layout with three (3) separate bedrooms! It feels like an 80+ m2 apartment because of its layout. 
 The apartment is energy efficient with an A label and has both a full kitchen as well as a full bathroom.This is a gorgeous refurbished and upholstered apartment with 2 bedrooms, 1 office/walk in closet, 2 French (Juliet) balconies of around 72 m2 on a quiet location in the popular Oud-West on the edge of Jordaan. 
 The building has been completely rebuilt in 2013, delivering the apartment a label A for energy efficiency, and has been refurbished in November 2020. Located on the second floor one enters the apartment in a hallway that connects to all the rooms of the apartment (see floorplan). 
 The orientation of the apartment is that it runs over the width of two buildings, giving 6 windows facing the pedestrian only zone in the front and 5 windows facing the interior gardens. The windows are oriented East and West, giving excellent morning and afternoon/evening light. 
 The living room is nice and spacious and has a French (Juliet) balcony facing South-West as well as an open kitchen with all modern appliances installed such as dishwasher, fridge, freezer, oven/microwave, stove and extractor fan. 
 The three bedrooms are laid out with two smaller ones in the front and the master bedroom in the back with the bathroom in the middle. One of the bedrooms is too small to be used as a bedroom for adults and can only be used as a walk in closet or small office.  
 The master bedroom overlooks the interior gardens and is equipped with a French (Juliet) balcony. The bathroom is equipped with a washbasin, cabinet space and a shower in the bathtub. 
 Please tell us a little more about yourself if you are interested in a viewing; 
 
 desired start date 
 length of lease 
 when are you available for viewings 
 nature of employment (employer, position, gross earnings) 
 outlook for Amsterdam, how long do you plan to stay 
 occupants of apartment // nature of household (who will live there - answer above for all occupants)

description:
Description 

                                                         Beautiful and unique two-storey apartment of 80m2 located in the vibrant Oud-West district! Every detail has been taken into account, the house is furnished and has 2 large outdoor areas. Come in quickly! 
 Surroundings 
The Ten Kateschool is located in the vibrant Ten Katestraat, located in the Oud-West district. This neighborhood is known for its many trendy restaurants and cafes. You can indulge yourself at Lot 61, Bar Centraal, De Spaghetteria, Café Panache, Le French Café, Café Hendrix, and The Breakfast Club. The crowning glory is the meeting place De Hallen, realized in 2014. Here you will find a diverse range of food courts, but also a cinema and library. In the street you will find the Ten Katemarkt every day, a charming market where you can do your daily fresh groceries, ideal and very cozy! 
 The center of Amsterdam, including the Jordaan and the 9 streets, can be reached within a few minutes by bike. For relaxation and recreation, you can go to the nearby parks: the Vondelpark and the Rembrandtpark. The house is conveniently located with public transport options, so you can quickly reach Amsterdam Central Station, Lelylaan Station, and Sloterdijk. The house is easily accessible from various arterial roads such as the A10 ring road. In addition, the street is one-way and parking is possible with a permit, which also gives you access to several parking garages in the area. 
 Layout 
This beautiful building called De Ten Kateschool breathes history and has been lovingly and with an eye for detail restored to meet the requirements of modern living. With its authentic details, such as the original wooden beams, the stained glass windows, and the terrazzo floors, the entrance of this apartment is an absolute eye-catcher. We have rarely seen a more beautiful entrance in Amsterdam. 
 Through the authentic entrance, you reach the apartment located on the second floor, you enter the hall and this gives you access to several rooms in the house. The toilet is spacious and equipped with a sink. 
 When you enter the living room, you will be surprised by the high ceilings and the beautiful light through the large windows. The good layout has created a spacious sitting and dining area, all details have been thought of, and the house is beautifully coordinated. The living room has a frame TV and the spotlights can be controlled 'smartly', ideal! Through French doors, the rear balcony can be reached from the living room. This has a sunny location on the southwest and borders a green, quiet courtyard. 
 The kitchen is set up in a corner shape and finished in black color tones. The kitchen is equipped with all necessary built-in appliances, including a dishwasher, induction hob with extractor hood, sink, oven, quooker, fridge/freezer, and storage space. 
 Via the stairs in the hall, you reach the second floor of the apartment. The master bedroom has a double bed, clothes rack, and air conditioning. Here too you can see that all colors and materials are coordinated, and beautiful. 
In the heart of the floor is the bathroom, it is neatly finished and has a washbasin, toilet, and walk-in shower. The second room has cupboard space, and can be divided as desired. Ideal for those working from home to create a workplace. 
 Via the stairs, you literally and figuratively reach the highest point of the house, the wonderful and spacious roof terrace. The roof terrace is equipped with a nice lounge sofa and dining table, here you can relax on warm summer days! The wide view provides a great experience! 
 Special features: 
 
 Located in the popular Oud-West district 
 The apartment has both a roof terrace of approx. 22 m² AND a balcony (directly off the living room) 
 2 bedrooms 
 Furnished 
 Available immediately 
 Rental price € 2950,- excl. facilities and incl. monthly cleaning 
 Deposit 2 months rent 
 Rental agreement model A (minimum 1 year) 
 
 If you meet the following requirements, you can request a viewing: 
 
 Candidate has a permanent job 
 Income requirement 3 X the gross rent 
 Sharing of the house is not desirable 
 Guarantee not possible 
 Pets not allowed

description:
Description 

                                                         Beautiful, luxurious ground floor apartment with lovely kitchen and 2/3 bedrooms within walking distance of Rotterdam Central Station (Rotterdam -CS). The apartment is located on the ground floor and has a basement with guest room annex study in the popular Blijdorp district in the immediate vicinity of the beautiful Vroezenpark, the international school, supermarket and arterial roads. 
 Blijdorp is a popular 1930s neighborhood that is very centrally located. Green and tranquility around you combined with all daily amenities a stone's throw away. Supermarkets, specialty stores, nice restaurants, cafes, schools and sports facilities within walking distance. Around the corner from the Statenweg the famous Vroezenpark, the favorite backyard of many Rotterdammers. Within walking distance of Diergaarde Blijdorp for a fun day out. Within a few minutes by bike you are in the city center of Rotterdam, centrally located in relation to public transport (including metro station Blijdorp) and arterial roads (A13 and A20). 
 Layout 
Ground floor: 
Hall with access to the living room, with beautiful open kitchen, a spacious bedroom and a smaller room that can be used as a small bedroom or walk-in closet. You will also find the toilet on the ground floor, separate from the bathroom. 
 Nice through-house with the living room at the front and the kitchen with adjoining veranda and well-kept spacious backyard located at the rear. 
 The modern kitchen is fully equipped and equipped with a gas hob, extractor hood, island with sink, dishwasher, refrigerator, large oven, separate microwave and plenty of storage space. The freezer is currently in the garden shed. However, there is space in the kitchen to move the freezer there. From the kitchen you have access to a nice veranda of approximately 10 m2 facing north, so you can enjoy the sun until late in the afternoon. 
 The large bedroom is located at the rear of the house. This room offers enough space for a double bed and a chest of drawers. 
 The beautiful bathroom with walk-in shower and double sink with casing is accessible from the hall. Access to the separate toilet is also located in the hall. 
 Basement: 
From the bathroom you reach the basement via a fixed staircase, which is used as a guest room and office space. Here you will also find a cupboard wall and space for the washing machine and dryer connection as well as the installation for the central heating boiler. 
 Comments: 
 
 The rental price excludes gas, water, electricity, TV/internet and municipal taxes; 
 Central heating; 
 Pets and smoking are not allowed in the house; 
 Duration of the rental agreement: 6 months; 
 This house is not suitable for house sharers/a living group.

description:
Description 

                                                         THE HAGUE BEZUIDENHOUT: Fully furnished 2 bedroom apartment on the first floor, next to the city center of The Hague! 
 PLEASE NOTE: The apartment is ONLY available for 2 STUDENTS who are not from the municipality of Rotterdam and whose duration of study lasts approx. 1 year! 
  Interested? Please respond by the contact buttons next to this description or send us an e-mail  
 KEY FEATURES: 
• Property is rented furnished 
• Living area of approximately 106m2 
• Located in a pleasant shopping street 
• Close to a wealth of amenities and transport links 
• Also suitable for 2 house sharers 
 AREA: 
Haagse Hout, one of the most beautiful and greenest districts of The Hague, offers a perfect mix of nature, culture and urban life. This district is a true oasis in the busy city and attracts both residents and visitors with its beautiful parks, stately avenues and various facilities. One of the highlights of Haagse Hout is the Haagse Bos, a vast forest area that extends from the center of the city to Wassenaar. This historic forest is one of the oldest forests in the Netherlands and offers numerous hiking and cycling trails, tranquil ponds and even a deer park. The Haagse Bos is the perfect place to escape the hustle and bustle of the city and enjoy nature. The stately Benoordenhout district is located in the middle of Haagse Hout, known for its elegant mansions, wide streets and green squares. This neighborhood exudes an atmosphere of peace and class, with a rich history and a diverse population. It's also home to some of the city's best schools and sports facilities, making it a popular choice for families. The Bezuidenhout district, another important part of Haagse Hout, offers a more lively atmosphere with numerous shops, restaurants and cafés. The famous Theresiastraat is the heart of this neighborhood, where you will find everything from boutiques to cozy eateries. Bezuidenhout is a dynamic and accessible neighborhood, ideal for young professionals and families who enjoy an urban lifestyle with a village character. 
 GROUND FLOOR: 
Closed porch and stairs to the floors.  
 FIRST FLOOR: 
From the hall there is access to all rooms. 
At the front of the house is the living room and open kitchen with built-in appliances such as an oven, gas stove, extractor hood and fridge-freezer combination. 
The two bedrooms and bathroom are located at the rear of the house. 
 •   Available directly 
•   The apartment is only available for 2 STUDENTS who are not from the municipality of The Hague and whose duration of study lasts approx. 1 year! 
•   The rent is excluding gas, water, electricity, TV / internet and municipal taxes 
•   The apartment will be rented furnished 
•   The apartment is suitable for a maximum of 2 house sharers 
•   Deposit equal to two months rent 
•   A temporary rental contract will be used (art. 7: 271 DCC, max 1 year) 
•   Renting with guarantor is possible in consultation (he or she needs to earn at least 4 times the rent) 
•   Housing allowance is not possible 
•   Pets and smoking not allowed 
•   The property has an energy label D 
•   Annual rent increase, 1 year after the commencement date of the rental agreement according to CPI 
•   The most recent WOZ value of the property is € 405.000,00 
 No rights can be derived from the data and photos. The given characteristics are only meant as an indication.
